content: this hat pattern is both cute and cozy the stranded knitting provides a thick double-layer of protection for your ears and hands in bouts of chilly weather the pattern is fun but not too complicated perfect for both beginners and more advanced knitters **sizing** i have provided instructions for 3 sizes for which the finished hat is 16 /40 5cm 18 /46cm 22 /56 cm in circumference you should choose a size that will give 2-3 /5-7 5cm negative ease so that the hat will hold onto your head snugly the heights of the finished hats are 7 5 /19cm 8 /20cm 8 7 /22cm tall to add more length simply add more row of ribbing or more row of plain stockinette in mc before/after the colorwork body section **yarn** worsted-weight yarn - 40-70 m 45-75 yds main color background - 40-60 m 45-65 yds contrasting color flowers the pattern also includes tips and tricks for stranded knitter beginners
